body.p:
You can use the Continue writing action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Content generation category to ask the AI Positron to continue the idea of a current paragraph.

The Continue writing AI action is incredibly useful to end users because it helps overcome writer's block and promotes creativity. By generating a continuation of a text based on the user's input, the AI action acts as a reliable writing companion, offering fresh ideas, different perspectives, and new directions for the narrative. It allows users to explore various options, expand on their thoughts, and discover unexpected storylines, ultimately enhancing the writing process and enabling users to produce high-quality content more efficiently.
Open the topic, place the caret at the end of the last paragraph and invoke the Continue writing action.
